attributes.action: stop immigrants coming over to this country and using our nhs resources.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: stop the immigrants coming over to this country and using our valuable nhs resources the waiting lists are long enough as is it without immigrants coming over having ops and then returning to their own countries we dont have the funding to keep this up.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
